text: Joel Barcellos (November 27, 1936 – November 10, 2018) was a Brazilian actor. He appeared in 53 movies and television shows between 1955 and 1997. He starred in the 1974 movie Sagarana: The Duel, which was entered into the 24th Berlin International Film Festival. He was born in Espírito Santo, Brazil. Barcellos died on November 10, 2018 in Rio das Ostras, Brazil from a stroke, aged 81.Morre aos 81 anos o ator Joel Barcellos ==Selected filmography== * Os Fuzis (1964) * My Home Is Copacabana (1965) * Sagarana: The Duel (1974) * Luz del Fuego (1982) == References == == Other websites == * Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:People from Espírito Santo
title: Joel Barcellos
